thread.title: Trump after 9th Circuit ruling: 'SEE YOU IN COURT, THE SECURITY OF OUR NATION IS AT STAKE'
thread.title_full: Trump after 9th Circuit ruling: 'SEE YOU IN COURT, THE SECURITY OF OUR NATION IS AT STAKE' | Washington Examiner

author: Anna Giaritelli
title: Trump after 9th Circuit ruling: 'SEE YOU IN COURT, THE SECURITY OF OUR NATION IS AT STAKE'
text:
President Trump promised additional legal action from his Justice Department on Thursday evening after the 9th Circuit denied his request to reinstate his ban on immigration from seven countries.
"SEE YOU IN COURT, THE SECURITY OF OUR NATION IS AT STAKE!" Trump tweeted moments after the ruling was announced.
SEE YOU IN COURT, THE SECURITY OF OUR NATION IS AT STAKE!— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 9, 2017 
Prior to Trump's tweet, the Washington state attorney general's office issued a three-word statement.

DENIED. UNANIMOUS. PER CURIUM.— WA Attorney General (@AGOWA) February 9, 2017
